summary: The newly formed team SG-1, led by Colonel Jack O'Neill, goes on a rescue mission to the planet Chulak.
cast: Richard Dean Anderson|Michael Shanks|Amanda Tapping|Christopher Judge|Don S. Davis|Jay Acovone|Vaitiare Hirshon|Robert Wisden|Peter Williams|Brent Stait|Gary Jones|Alexis Cruz|Rachel Hayward|Rick Ravanello|J.B. Bivens|Stephen Sumner|Adam J. Harrington|John 'Bear' Curtis|John Tierney|Colin Lawrence|Garvin Cross|Anthony Ashbee|Eric Schneider|Andrew McIlwaine|Santo Lombardo|Sean Amsing|Monique Rusu|Janette Devries|Darryl Scheelar
title: Stargate SG-1: Children of the Gods - Final Cut
